title: Mobile-Based Nursing Education Transition to Online Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented online nursing education course for general citizens adapting to non-face-to-face learning post-COVID-19. Enhances learner engagement through web-based tools and journaling activities using mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively utilize three or more web-based tools for transitioning nursing education to online formats.
Learners enhance self-reflection skills by writing weekly journals three or more times in mobile environments.
Learners demonstrate the ability to resolve technical issues arising in online course design within 24 hours through formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
